description: The section to hold the parameters to be applied by default to each record in the nodes section.

keyfile.description: The absolute path to keyfile on a local machine to access the remote machines.

password.description: The password to SSH-access the remote machines.

username.description: The username to SSH-access the remote machines.

connection_port.description: The port for SSH-connection to remote machines.

connection_timeout.description: The timeout for SSH-connection to remote machines.

taints.description: The additional taints for nodes. Caution: Use at your own risk. It can cause unexpected behavior. No support is provided for consequences.

gateway.description: The gateway that should be used to connect to nodes.
